tp.pr4.control

Class ConsoleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr4.control.Controller
      • tp.pr4.control.ConsoleController

  • public class ConsoleController
extends Controller
    Class which controls the execution of the game in a console mode, presenting the user with a set of alternatives and asking which he/she wishes to choose until the game finishes. This, in principle, is the class Controller of the previous assignments, with some refactoring to use MVC.
    Since:
    Assignment 4

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConsoleController(GameTypeFactory factory, Game g)
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run()
      It create the console view, and executes the game until it finishes or the user request to exit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsoleController

        public ConsoleController(GameTypeFactory factory,
                 Game g)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        factory - The gameType factory to be used.
        g - The game which is to be played.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        It create the console view, and executes the game until it finishes or the user request to exit. It is assumed that this method is called just once. If it is called again, the behaviour is undefined.
        Specified by:
        run in class Controller
